com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.users

Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.util.ExtensibleObject
      • com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.users.Group

  • public class Group
extends ExtensibleObject
    Class that defines the methods of group. Groups are categories of users. Created by Ozan Arslan on 13.07.2017

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.util.ExtensibleObject

        anyObject

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public Long getId()
        Get the unique identifier of the group. If the group was retrieved from the platform, it has an ID. If just created, there is no ID. The returned groupId here is a number instead of a string unlike other ids such as users' or roles'.
        Returns:
        Long the unique identifier of the group or null if not available.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        The method to return the group name.
        Returns:
        name a String with the name of the group.

      • setName

        public void setName(String name)
        The method to set group name.
        Parameters:
        name - is a String with the name of the group.

      • getUsers

        public UserReferenceCollection getUsers()
        Return the users of the group.
        Returns:
        a collection with the users assigned to this group.

      • setUsers

        public void setUsers(UserReferenceCollection users)
        Set the users of the group.
        Parameters:
        users - a collection with the users to assign to this group.

      • getRoles

        public RoleReferenceCollection getRoles()
        Return the roles of the group.
        Returns:
        roles a collection of type RoleReferenceCollection containing the roles assigned to this group.

      • setRoles

        public void setRoles(RoleReferenceCollection roles)
        Set the roles for the group
        Parameters:
        roles - a collection of type RoleReferenceCollection containing the roles to assign to this group.

      • getDevicePermissions

        public Map<String,List<DevicePermission>> getDevicePermissions()
        The method to retrieve the assigned device permissions of a group. The map contains a series of keys of device ids, and the values are a list of permissions of different type.
        Returns:
        a map of device permissions of a group

      • setDevicePermissions

        public void setDevicePermissions(Map<String,List<DevicePermission>> devicePermissions)
        The method to set device permissions to a group. It allows to set more than one type of device permissions for more than one device at once by employing a map of device ids and a list of permissions.
        Parameters:
        devicePermissions - a map with device id as a key and a list of permission strings as a value.
